# LLM Docs

## Compact Docs

Copy just this section if you want to keep your context small.
If you want all docs, check the section `Full Docs per Module` below.

Node.element : Str, List Attribute, List Node -> Node
Node.text : Str -> Node
Node.num : Num * -> Node
Node.bool : Bool -> Node
Node.attribute : Str, Str -> Attribute
Node.render : Node -> Str
Node.escape_xml : Str -> Str
Document.with_declaration : Node -> Document
Document.render : Document -> Str

## Full Docs per Module
### Node

Description:
XML attribute

Description:
XML node

element : Str, List Attribute, List Node -> Node

Description:
Create an XML element

text : Str -> Node

Description:
Create a text node

num : Num * -> Node

Description:
Create a number node

bool : Bool -> Node

Description:
Create a boolean node

attribute : Str, Str -> Attribute

Description:
Create an attribute

render : Node -> Str

Description:
Render a node to `Str`

escape_xml : Str -> Str

Description:
Escape special XML characters

### Document

Description:
XML document with optional declaration

with_declaration : Node -> Document

Description:
Create a document with standard XML 1.0 UTF-8 declaration

render : Document -> Str

Description:
Render a document to string
